section.p: The day before yesterday, I went down hill to the Muriwai surf school with Martin. There were a couple of call for hiring wetsuit and surfboard. I toke my camera and got some nice photos of beach and waves.
When I supposed to go back with Martin. He toke me to the Gannet Colony. That was amazing. It was a my fisrt time to see gannet. A lot of nice photos again.
Thanks Martin, I had a good day.
